mapper.select: SELECT MO.ID 'orderId', M.NAME 'userName', P.NAME 'productName', OL.COUNT 'count', P.PRICE*OL.COUNT 'totalPrice' FROM MEMBER_ORDER MO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON MO.MEMBER_ID = M.ID LEFT JOIN ORDER_LIST OL ON MO.ID = OL.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON OL.PRODUCT_ID = P.ID;
